title: Executive Order 5230-Amendment of Schedule A, Positions Excepted from Examination Under the Civil Service Rules
content: Schedule A, positions excepted from the requirement of examination under the civil service rules, is hereby amended by the addition of a new subdivision, to be numbered XXI, as follows:
1. One private secretary or confidential clerk to each Member of the Federal Farm Board.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5230-Amendment of Schedule A, Positions Excepted from Examination Under the Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/372828
